Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 13:44:47

--------------------------------------------------
ID: C15C05Z_00
From: Teresa Woodward <Teresa.Woodward@howdengroup.com>
To: 'Pauline Battini' <p.battini@christofle.com>
CC: 'joe.nasr@nascofrance.com' <joe.nasr@nascofrance.com>; 'm.bellec@christofle.com' <'m.bellec@christofle.com'>; 'c.benyahia@christofle.com' <c.benyahia@christofle.com>; Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2024-11-21 14:31
Subject: Material Damage & Business Interruption Amended Documentation
--------------------------------------------------
CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن


Dear Pauline

 

We have, at long last!, received amended documentation from AXA XL noting the correct overall contents sum insured of £1,413,557 for contents at the Harrods and Selfridges stores.

 

I trust you will find this in order, but if you do have any queries please let me know.

 

I will be contacting you in the next few days to obtain updates for the upcoming renewals for your MD & BI, Employers Liability and Public & Products Liability policies.

 

Kind regards

 

Teresa Woodward, Cert CII

Broker, Global & Corporate Risks

 

D 0044 (0)121 260 1712

chunks.text:
8th Floor, 45 Church Street, Birmingham, B3 2RT

howdengroup.com

 

 

 

If you would like to receive a paper copy of the enclosed documents please let us know and we will send these to you.

Duty of Fair Presentation

We take this opportunity to remind you that you owe a duty to make a fair presentation of the risk to the insurer. You have a duty to disclose to the insurer every material circumstance which you know or ought to know after a reasonable search or which is sufficient to put the insurer on notice that it needs to make further enquiries for the purpose of revealing those material circumstances. In addition, you have a duty to disclose information in a clear and accessible manner

 

 

________________________________

In order to comply with our regulatory requirements following the UK’s exit from the EU, Howden Group need to carry out intermediary activities under specific corporate entities for EEA domiciled policyholders and non-EEA domiciled policyholders.  If you have any queries please contact us or refer to our website.

Non EEA Policyholders

Howden Insurance Brokers Limited is registered in England and Wales under company registration number 725875. Registered office: One Creechurch Place, London, EC3A 5AF, United Kingdom. Tel: +44 (0)20 7623 3806. Website: www.howdengroup.com <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Furl.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com%2Fs%2F6f7wCv9E4I7oymNcAsgHQkODb%3Fdomain%3Dhowdengroup.com&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Cc4a2d90d509a499986be08dd0a17ace1%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638677819154921767%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=bu5hbh%2FmYC5RMVOFO3MVCCFR9%2BL5Pd0MbA4krBZnZ4Q%3D&reserved=0> .
